general_advisory: The mean maximum daily temperature was 34.7°C and the mean minimum daily temperature was 17.4°C of the Gajapati district during the last week...

advisory: Farmers those who have already transplanted should apply 35 kg Urea per acre at 3 weeks after transplanting...
To manage aphids, and thrips spray Neem Based Pesticide 300 PPM @ 1-litre /acre...
The larvae of brinjal shoot and fruit borer burrows into the petioles and tender shoots...
The transplanted tomato crop is at fruit development to maturity (nine to twelve week) stage...
The transplanted onion is at vegetative to bulb formation (six to nine week) stage...
The space left for ventilation must be closed in night, as the night temperature is expected to fall in coming days...
In the prevailing winter, there is a possibility of “EUS” (Epizootic vicerative syndrome)...
To protect the poultry from cold, cover the farm with polythene or gunny bag...
